Rocky Real Estate is proud to present this marina view apartment in Cayan Tower, Dubai Marina. * Built-up size: 1,254.64 square feet* Unfurnished* Equipped kitchen* Additional room/s: Laundry* With balcony* View: Marina* 1 car parking* On high floor* Tenanted until March 2024* Rented at AED 138,000* Reference number: RO-SDubai Marina is a one-of-a-kind residential destination. The neighbourhood is home to some of the most iconic skyscrapers offering panoramic views of the man-made Marina. Also, it is home to many commercial buildings, elite restaurants, cafes and famous shopping malls. Among its various record-breaking skyscrapers, Cayan Tower is a tall residential tower with a twist. With its unique structure and architectural design, not only it allows splendid views of Dubai Marina but is also a stunning addition to Dubai’s real estate market. Formerly known as Infinity Tower,  the helical structure was renamed to celebrate its uniqueness. Dubai Marina Cayan Tower took 8 years to complete. Upon its inauguration ceremony in 2013 by Cayan Investment and Development, 80% units were sold out even though interior fittings were in progress. The project has already been honoured by a number of awards including Arabian Property Awards, International Property Awards and Chicago Athenaeum. When launched, it was the world’s tallest tower with a twisted structure. Cayan Tower currently ranks as the 21st tallest building in Dubai. Dubai Marina is the District in Dubai, United Arab Emirates(UAE) was constructed along a 2-mile (3km) stretch of the Persian Gulf shoreline. Opened in the year 2003 the unique and spectacular man-made marina covers 50 million square feet of the seafront. Being a shoreline district, Dubai Marina is well known for its Wonderful Jumeirah Beach a massive residential area with sky-hitting luxurious high-rise towers that are home to more than 45000 residents. This Exotic city is well known for magnificent skyscrapers including the world-famous Burj Khalifa from where you can enjoy the panoramic view of this fantabulous city. What is so special about Dubai Marina?Luxurious residential towersThe Neighbourhood of the marina has been developed with over 200 residential towers, almost every apartment in the city boasts all the required amenities including swimming pools, BBQ restaurants, Children’s playgrounds, sports courts, and well-equipped gyms. If you can reside on any of the high floors in the skyscrapers you will have the privilege of waking up with a breathtaking view of this luxury-filled city and the seaside. Dubai Marina is one of the best places to work, stay, and tour around in the UAE. Exquisite Walking ExperienceMarina is a most happening luxurious city that can overwhelm you with its innumerable luxurious shops and restaurants where you can go for an exquisite walk that can long up to seven kilometers with a waterfront view on the other side. Residents of the city will usually stay out walking along the sidewalk and spend their leisure time hanging around with friends in the neighborhood. Huge variety of hangout destinationsApart from work, Dubai Marina has lots of other things to do while you are on your holidays. When you need time off from your routine you canGo for a simple walk or camel ride at Marina BeachShop a variety of fabulous items in Dubai Marina MallRide in zipline between Dubai Marina Mall and Amwaj Tower to enjoy the whole view of high-rise towers and luxury yachtsHave an authentic English breakfast at the Dubai Marina Yacht ClubGet an Arabic and Thai massage at any of the local spas in the city

The 73 floor plates are all identical but each is rotated by 1.2 degrees against the floor below it, resulting in a full 90-degree twist over the course of the tower's 307-metre rise, creating the shape of a helix. * Wind load and solar heat gain are reduced compared to a rectilinear building of the same height. * On completion, Cayan Tower was the world's tallest tower featuring a 90˚ twist. The shape of the tower is a variation on Turning Torso in Malmö, Sweden, which also twists exactly 90˚. * The designers of this waterfront tower, Skidmore Owings and Merrill, are known for other world-renowned projects such as Burj Khalifa, Trump Tower in Chicago, and Jin Mao in Shanghai.

The project was developed by Damac Properties. Construction began in 2003 and was completed by 2006. The architectural consultant was HOK Canada, Inc.  and the architectural consultant was Norr Group Consultants International Ltd. There are 33 residential floors above a five-storey podium. Marina Terrace was Damac’s first sortie into real estate construction, and when the building was launched in October 2002 the projected completion date was given as an improbable 2004. Not surprisingly the project was hit by delays, and although completed in 2005 the apartments were not handed over to residents until February 2006.  According to the Khaleej Times, Damac’s marketing tactics were probably the most aggressive in the business. For example, during Dubai Shopping Festival 2004 the company was giving away an Audi car with the purchase of apartments, and later a free Jaguar.
